name: SandCastles VR
description:
Build sandcastles in a relaxing beach environment. Watch the waves and chill out to some tunes!

Gameplay  Trailer

Controls:
Grip to grab 
Trigger to place sand with a bucket or dig with the shovel.
A/X Change the music.
B/Y Turn off the music.
  Primary Axis (joy/thumbstick control) button to move around your sandcastle creation.

Hardware Requirements:
Oculus Quest VR Headset.
One working controller.
